Cover and chill. Just before serving, whisk cream once or twice to refluff, but don’t overwhip it.Berries and AssemblyStep 3Combine berries, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Let sit, tossing occasionally, until juicy, at least 15 minutes.Step 4Add berries to whipped cream and fold gently until mixture is streaky but barely combined (just one or two strokes should do it). Scoop into small glasses.Step 5Do Ahead: Berries can be macerated 2 hours ahead.
